item.title: Preparation for the trip
item.description: Table of Contents Why you should prepare ? Mental & Emotional Preparation Why Self-Confidence is Critical? Preparation Physical Preparation Clothing Financial Planning Financial Planning Administration 1st way 2nd way Plane ticket Organisation TL;DR Before arriving to France you need to prepare for your arrival, this will make your integration here easier. Getting ready mentally, physically, financially, and administratively is something you shouldnâ€™t skip or ignore.
